This page allows testing of the turbo replace stylesheets functionality, which will replace stylesheet tags in place (maintaining their order) if their digest changes.

To test, click through the various letter combinations below. You should see no flicker (unless dev tools are open) and you should only see a "Yes" or a "No" in the below section under each of the "One A"/"One B", etc. If you see both a "Yes" and a "No" in one row, that indicates a problem.

If the header changes to indicate that one and two are no longer in order, that is a bug.

One B: No
Two A:
Two B: No
A/A A/B B/A B/B
